se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns

Class DefaultProjectParentPatterns

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns.AbstractMavenModelPatterns
      • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer.patterns.DefaultProjectParentPatterns
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MavenModelPatterns

    public class DefaultProjectParentPatterns
extends AbstractMavenModelPatterns
    Default MavenModelPatterns implementation for a project parent POM, typically on the following form: 
         <parent>
         <groupId>se.jguru.nazgul.core.poms.core-parent</groupId>
         <artifactId>nazgul-core-parent</artifactId>
     </parent>

     <groupId>com.acme.foobar.poms.foobar-parent</groupId>
     <artifactId>foobar-parent</artifactId>
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pattern ARTIFACT_ID_PATTERN
      Required pattern for artifactIDs within top-level reactor POMs.
      static Pattern GROUP_ID_PATTERN
      Required pattern for groupIDs within top-level reactor POMs.
      static Pattern PARENT_ARTIFACT_ID_PATTERN
      The pattern for parent's artifactIDs within top-level reactor POMs.
      static Pattern PARENT_GROUP_ID_PATTERN
      The pattern for parent's groupIDs within top-level reactor POMs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultProjectParentPatterns()
      Default constructor, passing all defined patterns to its superclass.
